TITLE: Infrastructure And Facilities
DEF: The physical and digital spaces and resources that support teaching, learning, and scholarship
TASK: The Infrastructure and Facilities pattern addresses the spaces and resources that facilitate teaching and learning within an educational institution. By promoting a conducive environment for these activities, this pattern is crucial for effective education. The challenges in resource management, updating facilities, ensuring accessibility, and provision of adequate resources can be mitigated by regular assessments and responsive management strategies.
